Package org.apache.fineract.infrastructure.core.service

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PlatformEmailService  
    RoutingDataSourceService
    A service for getting hold of the appropriate DataSource connection pool.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbandonedConnectionCleanupShutdownListener  
    DataSourceForTenants
    Implementation that returns connection pool datasource for tenants database
    DateUtils  
    GmailBackedPlatformEmailService  
    Page<E>  
    PaginationHelper<E>  
    RoutingDataSource
    Based on springs AbstractRoutingDataSource idea, this is a DataSource that routes or delegates to another data source depending on the tenant details passed in the request.
    RoutingDataSourceServiceFactory
    Factory class to get data source service based on the details stored in ThreadLocal variable for this request ThreadLocalContextUtil is used to retrieve the Context
    SearchParameters  
    TenantDatabaseUpgradeService
    A service that picks up on tenants that are configured to auto-update their specific schema on application startup.
    ThreadLocalContextUtil  
    TomcatJdbcDataSourcePerTenantService
    Implementation that returns a new or existing tomcat 7 jdbc connection pool datasource based on the tenant details stored in a ThreadLocal variable for this request.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PlatformEmailSendException
